BasicDescription.Title: World Briefing
BasicDescription.Synopsis: World news and despatches.

BasicDescription.Title: Sports Roundup
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Sports Roundup brings you sports news, stories and results from all around the world. The team of global correspondents collect stories, scores and interviews.

BasicDescription.Title: World Business Review
BasicDescription.Synopsis: A summary of the week's business news.

BasicDescription.Title: Letter From America
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Alistair Cooke presents his weekly essay on life in the USA.

BasicDescription.Title: World News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest news updates from around the world.

BasicDescription.Title: Brain Of Britain
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Robert Robinson chairs the contest to find this year's brainiest brainbox, and who will receive the coveted title of Brain of Britain.

BasicDescription.Title: Newshour
BasicDescription.Synopsis: News, comment and analysis from around the world. Newshour brings you the latest live reports on events all over the globe.

BasicDescription.Title: The World Today
BasicDescription.Synopsis: News and analysis from around the world.

BasicDescription.Title: Pick Of The World
BasicDescription.Synopsis: A selection of some of the most memorable moments of the past seven days on BBC World Service.

BasicDescription.Title: Play Of The Week
BasicDescription.Synopsis: By Patricia Highsmith. Greg is still missing, and Detective Lippenholtz is finding Robert's story - that he pulled him out of the river after their fight - harder to believe.

BasicDescription.Title: From Our Own Correspondent
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The background to the news from BBC correspondents around the world.

BasicDescription.Title: Reporting Religion
BasicDescription.Synopsis: World religious news stories of the past week.

BasicDescription.Title: Global Business
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Features and discussions on international business.

BasicDescription.Title: Agenda
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Discussion programme exploring the ideas and thinking behind issues of modern life.

BasicDescription.Title: Assignment
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Assignment delves behind the headlines to find out how news events affect people's lives. Whatever the subject, wherever the location, the stories are of real human interest.

BasicDescription.Title: Composer Of The Month
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Wagner: Chris De Souza on the life and works of Richard Wagner.

BasicDescription.Title: Music Review
BasicDescription.Synopsis: News, views, and books from the world of music. Presented by Mark Lowther.

BasicDescription.Title: In Praise Of God
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Each week, In Praise Of God explores the devotional side of faith, from Britain's choral tradition to the varied forms of worship of the world's great faiths.

BasicDescription.Title: British News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest news and comment from Britain.

BasicDescription.Title: Network Europe
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Magazine programme with a focus on the issues that affect Europeans.

BasicDescription.Title: Talking Point
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Topical news stories discussed and debated. Listeners around the world can take part in the live multi-media programme by emailing: talkingpoint@bbc.co.uk

BasicDescription.Title: People And Politics
BasicDescription.Synopsis: From Westminster, analysis of the policies and personalities at the heart of British government. Followed by a news summary.

BasicDescription.Title: The Music Party
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Series on the origins of chamber music. In this edition, young soprano, Sally Matthews, gives a recital from Surrey. Presented by Martin Handley.

BasicDescription.Title: Sunday Sportsworld
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Coverage of the day's top international sporting events. Followed by a news summary.

BasicDescription.Title: World Briefing
BasicDescription.Synopsis: World news and despatches.

BasicDescription.Title: Sports Roundup
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Sports Roundup brings you sports news, stories and results from all around the world. The team of global correspondents collect stories, scores and interviews.

BasicDescription.Synopsis: World religious news stories of the past week.

BasicDescription.Synopsis: The background to the news from BBC correspondents around the world.

BasicDescription.Synopsis: Features and discussions on international business.

BasicDescription.Synopsis: Assignment delves behind the headlines to find out how news events affect people's lives. Whatever the subject, wherever the location, the stories are of real human interest.

BasicDescription.Synopsis: Discussion programme exploring the ideas and thinking behind issues of modern life.
